manual.title: __**Welcome To The World Of GT Fitness!**__
description: (Rules may change over time)

In this Gran Turismo/Cars/Racing related server, you are able to gain points in the chat to earn new licenses (leveled roles) in GT Fitness. You can also use my custom GT Fitness bot to gain credits, exp, points, etc through multiple events!
You can view your points by typing **t!rank** in the bot commands channel.
:warning: You are allowed to speak English or Japanese!
Main Invite link: http://discord.gg/pYMYCY8
Racing Team Invite Link: https://discord.gg/VSh3FEB

manual.title: __**Reminder: This Is A Gran Turismo Server**__
description: If you do not have interest in Gran Turismo, racing games, or cars, you will be asked to leave the server.

manual.title: __**FAQs**__
description: **How can you earn points for new licenses?**

1. Typing in the chat. You earn 50-60 points per every message (approx.)
2. Any giveaways announced in <#424247409699192833>.
:warning: The maximum of points for a giveaway is 5,000.
**Where is the channel for bot commands?**

1. Generally, its <#432667283031195648>.
2. For other bots in the server, you can unlock them through earning licenses, and you can use them in its designated lobby.
**How can I get roles?**
**Have any more questions/suggestions?**

manual.title: __**Rules**__
description:
:one: __Minimize Advertisements__
Discord server invites and big advertisements are not allowed, except for in <#644052910334017556>.
:warning: Smaller advertisements are allowed; but, keep it at a minimum.

:two: __No NSFW Content In Channels__
NSFW not allowed in open lobbies or **any channel** except for channels with a ðŸ”ž label. Some NSFW examples are:
- Extreme blood/gore
- Graphic/Sexual activity
- Extremely offensive content
- Other NSFW conversations/pictures
:warning: Spoilers also applies to this rule. ||don't even try|| Even <#508820132513054720> applies this rule. Even your avatar applies to this rule.

:three: __No Politics In Channels__
For discussing controversial news/politics, use <#679590180742496361>.

:four: __No Spamming__
The moderation bot will give you a warning, and then a mute if you persist.
:warning: Spam is allowed in <#348854157698138112> and <#432667283031195648>.

:five: __No Duplicate Accounts__
They are prohibited without logical reasons (i.e. temporary account, 2-Step authentication loss, etc).
:warning: You will not get your points/credits/progress back.

:six: __No Account Sharing__
Sharing account information publicly in any channel is prohibited. DMs are okay.

:seven: __Gaming Role Pings__
Once you have gaming roles, you commit of any pings by GTF members. Remove them if it bothers you.
:warning: Do not spam mention roles either because Rule 4.

:eight: __Drama__
Limit the amount of drama in lobbies (unless for satirical purposes). Any disrespect or ignorance against the rules will be consequenced.

manual.title: __**Rules - Part 2**__
description:
:nine: __No Offensive/Racial Slurs In Usernames__
You will be asked to change your nickname if your username is too offense (such as both N word terms). If not, part of your username will be censored.

:keycap_ten: __No Mute Rejoins__
When you are muted, **do not rejoin the server to avoid a mute.** You will have an automatic temporary/permanent ban.

:one::one: __Channel Descriptions__
Read the channel descriptions from each channel. They may save you a lot of time.

:one::two: __R E S P E C T__
Respect each other and people's backgrounds. Enough said.
:warning: Any complaints can be reported by pinging Moderator or Adminstrator roles.

:one::three: __Moderators__
Listen to moderators when they are doing their duties. Respect the moderators' orders or you may receive warnings.

:one::four: __Disboard, Public Server Listings, etc__
Do not add this server to public server listings such as Disboard and other non-car related advertisement threads such as r/DiscordServers. This will result in an immediate kick/ban and the server link will become invalid.

:one::five: __Discord Community Guildlines Apply Here!__
:warning: You will be kicked/banned from the server if you are under 13 years old.
:question: **Violating important GTF rules may result first with some warnings. If any more problems continues, this may result in a mute, kick, ban, or other consequences.**

manual.title: __**Etiquettes**__
description:
<#508820132513054720>
In this lobby, generally many memes such as edgy, dank, funny content can be posted here except for the following:
- NSFW content (belongs in #freedom-lobby)
- Dark humor (especially involving death or intentional hatred against a certain group) (belongs in #freedom-lobby)
- Sensitive/Offensive Content (belongs practically nowhere)

:warning: If a certain meme gets too controversial from others, mods are allowed to delete the meme and/or provide warnings.

<#748053732582752326>
This is a resource/discussion for any glitches/bugs/exploits you can discover across racing games. Other games that aren't related to racing are also open. Even if you think if the certain action may not be a glitch, they can also be posted here for discussions. The following posts will not be allowed and will be deleted and/or lead to warnings:
- NSFW content
- Memes that does not present any in-game glitches
- Mods/Hacks/Addons that does not result in-game glitches
**JOIN THE FITNESS RACE!**
